Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
I am Avant-Garde, the Transformation Wizard. I have long wandered through the land and only recently settled here.
In fact, my young friend, I am not a wizard of the Ivory Tower. You look surprised! Heh. Think of me as a wanderer who acquired a special power quite by chance... My magic, however, requires some very specialized items.
If you have acquired these unique items from the dark wizard in Hardin's Academy, then perhaps I can help you.
Ask about transformation.
Learn transformation.
Purchase items related to transformation.
Learn about subclass certification.
Quest.

Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
You must be able to transform in order to buy transformation-related goods.
Find a great wizard who wields black magic and can open the path to transformation for you. The you may return here.

Wizard of Transformation Avant-Garde:
What do you wish to know about transformation?

"What do I need to know about transformation?"
"What do I need to do to transform into another shape?"
"What do I need to know before transformation?"

Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
You must remember that once you have been transformed, you must not go into deep water. Once you have reverted to your original form, your soul will need some time to recover -- you will not be able to transform again for some time. Understand?
Other than that... Each individual soul contains its own unique character. If you transform into something that matches that character, you may earn some benefits. Think of it as wearing a suit of clothes that fit you perfectly. Every race has its own respective "figure", so I advise you to do a little research about what kind of transformation would fit you best.
Back.

Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
This is not a path for every one. It is meaningless for me to even teach you Transformation until you have proven your ability.
Meet the great wizard who uses black magic, open the road of Transformation, and then return to me.

Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
To learn the magic of transformation, you will need to receive special training.
Find the Wizard of Darkness, who lives at Hardin's Academy. He will open the path to transformation.
You must have reached at least level 50 to embark on this path.
You will also need a special seal. I do not know how you can obtain it, but without it transformation is impossible.
Back.

Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
After you have been guided through the process of transformation by a wizard, you may transform yourself into another shape by bringing a transform sealbook to me.
Know that it is no easy task to earn one. I have heard, however, that you may find one through the Marketeer of Mammon or the Adventure Guild.
Back.
